name: Documentation Generation
description: Generates comprehensive documentation for code including API docs, comments, and usage examples
author: DebugBuddy Team

template.task: Generate comprehensive documentation for the provided ${language} code

language_doc_standards.typescript: TSDoc format with type annotations and interface documentation
language_doc_standards.python: Google/NumPy docstring format with type hints
language_doc_standards.go: Go doc format with package and function comments
language_doc_standards.rust: Rust doc format with /// comments and examples

documentation_formats.javascript:
/**
 * Description
 * @param {type} name - description
 * @returns {type} description
 * @example
 * // usage example
 */
documentation_formats.python:
"""
Description

Args:
    param (type): description

Returns:
    type: description

Example:
    >>> example usage
"""
documentation_formats.java:
/**
 * Description
 * @param name description
 * @return description
 * @throws Exception description
 */

metadata.performance_notes: Optimized for documenting functions, classes, and modules up to 1000 lines
